price: ऐ इनसान! तुझे किस चीज़ ने तेरे उदार पालनहार से बहका दिया?
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلۡكَرِيمِ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-insānu mā gharraka birabbika al-karīmi
